Banner.title:
We build our future
Brick by Brick!

text.paragraph0: We are team #15996, BrickBot, from <cnu>"Unirea" National College, Focșani, Romania</cnu>.
text.paragraph1: We are proud to be the first robotics team in our county to take part in the international competition <ftc>FIRST Tech Challenge</ftc>.
text.paragraph2: We dedicate ourselves with a passion for building robots and promoting STEAM education within our community.

Carousel.SparkHope2025: SparkHope Robotics Cup Winning Alliance, August 2025
Carousel.FocsaniMeet2025: DIVE Into Innovation League Meet, Jan 2025

Answer.paragraph0: FIRST (For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology) is an organization that encourages young people to study STEAM subjects through robotics competitions.
Answer.paragraph1: Within <ftc>FIRST Tech Challenge (FTC)</ftc>, teams of primary school and high school build and program robots every year, to fulfill a series of dynamic tasks.
Answer.paragraph2: The competition was brought to Romania by <natie>Nație Prin Educație</natie>, partnering with <brd>BRD</brd>.

1.Question: What fields does the team work in?

Answer.paragraph0: Our team combines technical skills with non-technical ones, both branches working together frequently.
Answer.paragraph1: The technical side consists of the assembly, 3D design and programming departments, while the non-tehcnical side takes on the mission of promoting the team and its social media pages (PR), graphic design, photography and attracting new sponsors.

Answer.paragraph0: To join the team you have to be a student of <cnu>"Unirea" National College of Focșani</cnu> and to be over 13 years old.
Answer.paragraph1: You don't need to have prior experience within your desired department. You will start off as a recruit and, with our help, you will be brought up to speed with all aspects of your chosen branch.
Answer.paragraph2: Complete the application form by clicking <apply>here</apply>.

Answer.paragraph0: You can support us through sponsorships or donations, receiving appropriate benefit according to our sponsorship packages. Likewise, we are open to attending or organizing events alongside companies or institutions.

text.paragraph0: Since 2016, season after season, we've been building robots for the <ftc>FIRST Tech Challenge</ftc> and we live by the values that represent us: outreach, creativity, ambition and team spirit.
text.paragraph1: Every step, from the first sketch to the final tests, reflects steady progress, built brick by brick. This is how we’ve shaped our team's identity and contributed to making STEAM education more accessible to young people.

JoinBrickBot.title: Join Brickbot
JoinBrickBot.text: Passionate about robotics? Fill out the form to show your interest in joining our team.

TheVault.submitText: Inspire the FTC community with your work.

text.paragraph0: Every year, student from more and more primary schools in our town discover robotics through our interactive presentations.
text.paragraph1: After they learn more things about us and the competitions we take part in, they get the chance to drive our robot and ask us any questions they might have.

InteractingWithThePublic.title: Interacting with the Public
InteractingWithThePublic.text: We get involved in our local community through presentations at different events, humanitarian activites, partnerships with businesses to spread our passion for robotics with as large a public as possible.

Carousel.BehindTheScrews: Behind The Screws - Collaboration with CEX Vrancea
Carousel.MicrometEvent: Exchange Event with our Main Sponsor, Micromet

text.paragraph0: An online meeting dedicated to the new FTC teams in Romania and the Moldovan Republic. We shared lessons we learned from our challenges and memorable moments of past competitions.
text.paragraph1: This event was organized in collaboration with team #25482 SIRIUS, which we are mentoring.

HowToHelp.title: How to Help
HowToHelp.text: BrickBot operates with the support of sponsors (companies, businesses, individuals). There are three ways to support us:

Redirect.title: Redirect 3.5%
Redirect.text: Romanian citizens can help BrickBot by redirecting 3.5% of income tax through Form 230 from the start of the year, until the 25th of May.

Donate.title: Donate
Donate.text: Soon, anyone will be able to support the BrickBot Association by making a secure donation of up to €100 through Stripe.

Contracts.title: Sponsorship Contracts
Contracts.text: You can support our initiative through financial contributions and/or services. The partnership will be formalized via a contract between your business and our organization.

Address.title: Address
Address.address: 13-15 Cezar Bolliac Street, Focșani, Vrancea, Romania
